questions: Who wants to help the poor children in the future?
article:
Miss Wang asks her students about their future jobs. Let's look at their answers.
Bob: I'm going to be a cool spy   like James Bond. I know it is difficult and dangerous. I will work hard and I look forward to studying in America one day.
Mike: I'm going to be a mathematician  , because maths is my favourite subject. I think it's very interesting.
Meimei: I'm going to become a singer in the future. I love singing. I hope one day I can become famous.
Lisa: I want to be a charitarian  . I will make a lot of money and help the poor children in the future.
